Write-Up Text: The Australian budget is the talk of the town among social media people. Amidst much buzz and excitement the Budget2023 predicts a small surplus the first in 15 years reflecting responsible financial management and investment in the future. While some are praising the budget for its commendable efforts towards promoting women's equality others are criticising it for not benefiting some sections of society. Nevertheless the federal budget is expected to paint a healthier picture with a $4 billion surplus and a dramatic turnaround in the nation's finances this year.
